etymology.description: 西门 + 町 = ward/block area by the West Gate.
etymology.interpretation: Refers to the Ximending commercial district in Taipei, named for its location by the former West Gate and the Japanese-era administrative unit 町. The reading dīng follows the Sino-Japanese place-name usage retained in Taiwan.
etymology.simplification: 门 is the standard simplification of 門 in PRC orthography; 町 is unchanged. Simplified form 西门町 is used in simplified texts, while Taiwan uses 西門町.

parts.english: west gate; western gate (of a city)

examples.chinese: 我们周末去西门町逛街(我們週末去西門町逛街)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen zhōumò qù Xīmén Dīng guàngjiē.
examples.english: We’re going to Ximending to shop this weekend.

examples.chinese: 西门町是台北著名的购物区(西門町是臺北著名的購物區)。
examples.pinyin: Xīmén Dīng shì Táiběi zhùmíng de gòuwù qū.
examples.english: Ximending is a famous shopping district in Taipei.

examples.chinese: 很多年轻人喜欢来这里看电影和街头表演(很多年輕人喜歡來這裡看電影和街頭表演)。
examples.pinyin: Hěn duō niánqīngrén xǐhuan lái zhèlǐ kàn diànyǐng hé jiētóu biǎoyǎn.
examples.english: Many young people like to come here to watch movies and street performances.
